Html:
First of all thanks for this great project. I'm also my own style of block-based code and watching this project continuously. I came with the idea of an irc channel where we guys can talk and share ideas.

Anyone up for this?
Or a steam group? let s innovate :)

I would much prefer IRC.

I'm using it daily for many other discussions, and it works well.

Which server should be used? Channel name could be #techcraft
Im up on #techcraft with freenode web access http://webchat.freenode.net/
